data.name: Castle Wars VR
data.detailed_description:
Get an extremely new look at the VR RTS. The game is easy to learn and hard to master.

It suits best for VR Computer Clubs and party of friends.

  • Feel yourself directly at the battlefield,
  • Command one of 3 different fantasy factions
  • Join campaign or multiplayer

Choose your side at the campaign of 9 missions at 3 difficulties

Human units abilities:

Warriors - get not more then 15 damage from one hit
Archers - get half of damage from distance attacks
Mage - сhain lightning
Gaint - the less HP he has, the bigger is his damage
Mad Fury - he is kamikaze
Paladins - enemy stun

Orc units abilities

Warriors - heal alliance after death
Archers - poison enemy
Assassins - teleportation
Warchief - first hit makes double damage
Mage - increase damage of alliy units
Shaman - returns damage

Undead units abilities

Skeleton - before death makes final hit with 60 damage
Archer - slows enemy
Zombie - 4 units in stack
Giant - splash damage
Lich - land poison
Necromant - curse his enemy

data.short_description: Castle Wars VR is real time strategy, build from the ground to VR. Feel yourself directly at the battlefield, command one of 3 different fantasy factions during the campaign or in the multiplayer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later, or Windows™ 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 / GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
